preposition.description: Coming after or as a result of.
examples: police are hunting for two men following a spate of robberies in the area

noun.description: A body of supporters or admirers.

examples: the following are both grammatically correct sentences
the following day there was a ceremony in St. Peter's Square

adjective.description: (of a wind or sea) blowing or moving in the same direction as the course of a vehicle or vessel.
